title: Kendall Jenner embraces her animal instincts as she dons dog graphic tee to shop at Petco
text:
She's been known to own two dogs and a snake.

And Kendall Jenner trekked off to Petco on Tuesday, likely with her animal friends in mind while wearing a dog-printed T-shirt and black biker shorts.

The Keeping Up with the Kardashians star, 23, paired her casual look with grey sneakers and black rectangular sunglasses during the trip out with two male friends.

Casual: Kendall Jenner trekked off to Petco with her pet friends likely in mind on Tuesday alongside two male pals in a dog-printed T-shirt and black biker shorts

She wore a black scrunchie on her right wrist and kept her arms crossed as she walked and talked with her buddies.

Kendall's T-shirt is likely a nod to her pet Doberman Pinscher whom she called her 'twin' in a recent Instagram photo caption.

Her sighting comes as it seems that fur-babies won't be enough for the Stuart Weitzman frontwoman.

On-the-go: The Keeping Up with the Kardashians star, 23, paired her casual look with grey sneakers and black rectangular sunglasses

Kendall admitted on an Oct. 6 episode of KUWTK that she 'can't wait to have a kid' to her sister Kim Kardashian.

The 5ft 10in beauty continued: 'I’m going to make him do the coolest things, so when he’s older, he’s just a stud.'

She dropped the hint to Kim as they chatted about Kim's six-year-old daughter North appearing on 16-year-old JoJo Siwa's YouTube channel.

Dog mom: Kendall's T-shirt is likely a nod to her pet Doberman Pinscher whom she called her 'twin' in a recent Instagram photo caption

Despite Kendall's comments, a source told HollywoodLife that she 'does not have baby fever.'

'It’s still all very hypothetical for her,' the source continued. 'When she said she can’t wait for that moment, it didn’t mean she’s planning to start a family anytime soon.'

'She still has a lot she wants to accomplish with her modeling career. And, she still considers herself very young. She’s not interested in rushing things.'

HollywoodLife spoke to a second source that insisted Kendall would need everything in order before making the decision to start a family.

Mom one day? Kendall admitted on an Oct. 6 episode of KUWTK that she 'can't wait to have a kid' to her sister Kim Kardashian

'She wants to eventually have a family, but she wants to be in a fully committed relationship to make it all happen,' the source said.

'She isn’t going to have a baby just to have one, but talking with her sisters about it is a way for them to relate to each other.'

The second source continued that Kendall is 'confident' that she will procreate someday, but is still comfortable waiting until the time is right.

Baby talk: The 5ft 10in beauty continued: 'I’m going to make him do the coolest things, so when he’s older, he’s just a stud'

'It’s fun to talk about, but then reality sets in it’s a different story,' the source said.

'So many other things have to fall into place. Saying it and rushing into it are two totally separate things all together. There will be no pregnancy announcements from Kendall anytime soon.'

Kendall is the only member of the Kardashian-Jenner clan sans children.
